channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bank of England keeps its main interest rate unchanged at 3.75% with UK inflation still above target
item.description: Bank of England keeps its main interest rate unchanged at 3.75% with UK inflation still above target

item.title: Parents of Colorado school shooter won't face gun charges, sheriff's office says
item.description: Authorities say the parents of a 16-year-old boy who wounded two students at a Colorado high school with an old revolver won't be charged

item.title: The detention of New Jersey kebab shop owners sparked change. Deportation still looms
item.description: The detention of a Turkish couple who own a New Jersey kebab shop helped galvanize their community against immigration crackdowns last year

item.title: Emergency crews evacuate patients and battle blaze at Pennsylvania hospital
item.description: Emergency crews battled a blaze and evacuated patients from a hospital in Pennsylvania as fire engulfed part of the facility

item.title: Arizona police helicopter crash kills pilot and trooper during shooter response
item.description: An Arizona Department of Public Safety helicopter responding to an active shooter situation has crashed, killing both the pilot and a trooper who was ...
